summary: This is a Wells Fargo consumer account application form for a checking account, submitted by Carlos Perez. The application lists his address as the U.S. Department of Justice and his current employer as Butner Prison, indicating he was an inmate at the time.

persons.name: Carlos Perez
persons.context: Individual applying to open a Wells Fargo Everyday Checking account, listing his address as the U.S. Department of Justice and his current employer as Butner Prison.

persons.name: Charles Beevers
persons.context: Wells Fargo banker listed on the account application form.

events.title: Bank Account Application Submission
events.description: Carlos Perez submits an application to open a Wells Fargo Everyday Checking account.

locations: Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (Belleview & Kipling store)
U.S. Department of Justice (listed as mailing address for Carlos Perez)
Butner Prison (listed as current employer for Carlos Perez)
keyFacts: Carlos Perez applied for a Wells Fargo checking account on November 17, 2016.
The application lists Perez's address as the U.S. Department of Justice.
Perez listed his current employer as Butner Prison, indicating he was an inmate at the time of application.
The account was for personal/household use with the purpose listed as 'Motor'.
The document is a standard consumer account application form with anti-money laundering disclosures.
